title: Govt empowers institutions to act without fear
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 24 (APP):Adviser to the Prime Minister on Interior and Accountability Mirza Shahzad Akbar Monday said that the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf government has empowered the state institutions to act in accordance with the law without any fear or favour.
In a tweet, he said “accountability is achievable only through the rule of law.”
The state institutions headed by Prime Minister Imran Khan were working according to their mandate, he added.
